column2: The §GCourt Faction§! strives for influence and vassal autonomy.
The §RGlory Faction§! strives for prestige and the spoils of war.
The §BOrder Faction§! strives for justice and a stable society.
The §YProsperity Faction§! strives for wealth and a healthy economy.
The §PTradition Faction§! strives for piety and the supremacy of religion.
